comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [See also investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp... ] Google Maps Street View - g.co/maps/yghf8 I did some research on Goulburn Gaol a while back, and think that this is one of a series of photos recording the construction or completion of the new gaol in 1884. See comments for this wonderful photo - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/4908458465/]

comment.author: 32162360@N00
32162360@N00
comment._content: 'Completion of the Goulburn Gaol' article in the SMH 6/8/1883 p.6 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/13541089 . It mentions that "the buildings are expected to be finished by the end of the year", And that the cost was about 30,000 pounds (about AU$ 5 million today).

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: And of passing interest, a wonderfully colourful description of the OLD Goulburn Gaol (where Goulburn Courthouse now stands) - SMH 9/5/1868 p.7 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/13165797
